snippet: Sean Eldridge and his husband, the Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes, bought two multimillion-dollar homes in New York State that were seen as launching pads for a Congressional run.
abstract: Sean Eldridge and his husband, Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes, bought two multimillion-dollar homes in New York State's Hudson Valley, which many observers view as launching pads for Eldridge's Congressional run; his ambitions puzzle some residents, who find it presumptuous for a rich newcomer to aspire to represent constituents he does not know.
lead_paragraph: Sean Eldridge and his husband, the Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes, bought two multimillion-dollar homes in New York State that were seen as launching pads for a Congressional run.

headline.main: Young, Rich and Relocating Yet Again in Hunt for Political Office
headline.print_headline: Young, Rich and Relocating Yet Again in Hunt for Political Office
